Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Wilcox
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson and Pulaski, due to fire department activity near Pulaski/Wilcox.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson, then resume their normal route on Pulaski, due to fire department activity near Pulaski/Wilcox.

Allow extra travel time.
